rules: Let's begin the puzzle hunt! Here are some rules

🧑‍🏫 [Rules: 1/3]
Now let's go through some ground rules before we hand you over to Void Deck Cat. Take your time to read them carefully, as your game timer has not started yet.

🐾 Your game is a trail of clues with scheduled break(s) in between. All team members will receive the clues from me at the same time, but only 1 team member is required to send a response at any given time to proceed. Please make sure only one person from the team sends me a message at any one time, or you will confuse the Cat and she may penalise you for it! Please be patient with the Cat as she ponders your answers.

🧑‍🏫 [Rules: 2/3]
Your game will be timed. Each incorrect answer adds a penalty of 5min to your final timing, so answer carefully! Need help solving a clue? Hints are available, but at a cost. Please refer to the image below for details.

The timer will be paused during breaks, so you can properly relax 😉

🧑‍🏫 [Rules: 3/3]
Finally, stay in public spaces, blend into your environment, and be discreet in your discussions - you never know if another team is listening in! In case of emergencies, tell me 'sos' and one of the Hidden Singapore humans will get in touch.

You do not need to enter any fenced premises or private property unless specifically asked to.

Feel free to also send in your selfies and photos through the race and have a chance to win our Selfie of the Month contest.

Ready for your first clue? Team captain, tell me 'UNDERSTOOD' and I will hand you over to Void Deck Cat. Good luck.
